personal.profile:
I am a web developer with robust problem-solving skills. Self-taught
					in React and Node, with a desire for constant learning and problem-
					solving.
personal.more: ReactJS, NextJS, Node, Express, React Router, Redux, EmberJS, EmberData
personal.other: Tailwind CSS, Bootstrap, Adobe XD, SQL, Git, Visual Studio Code, Linux

career.headline: Web developer
obligations: Developing efficient and maintainable code using ReactJS, EmberJS, and NextJS for seamless client-side and server-side rendering, and improved web application performance
Designing visually appealing website layouts and interfaces using HTML/CSS, with a focus on responsive design using Bootstrap and styling with Tailwind CSS
Integrating data from back-end services and databases, using SQL for database design, querying, and optimization
Collaborating with backend developers to optimize database performance and ensure smooth data integration with SQL databases
Contributing to best practices for version control using Git
Utilizing Adobe XD for prototyping and design collaboration
Using Linux to facilitate deployment and maintenance processes
